hero.subtitle_line2: Creating exceptional value with innovation and expertise

success_stories.public_title: Common Challenges in the Public Sector
success_stories.builders_subtitle: We work closely with builders across Taiwan, from smart homes to large communities, delivering integrated low‑voltage and smart building solutions.

philosophy_items.title: Deep Understanding
philosophy_items.description: We deeply understand your needs and challenges to find the best solutions from the root.

philosophy_items.title: Tailor‑made
philosophy_items.description: We provide the most suitable customized solutions to meet your unique business goals.

philosophy_items.title: Professional Execution
philosophy_items.description: Rigorous project management and strong technical expertise ensure efficient delivery.

business_feature.title: System Integrators
business_feature.pain_point: Integration with low‑voltage and IoT systems often hits coordination and O&M bottlenecks?
business_feature.description: Modular APIs and open protocols lower integration cost by 40% with centralized O&M.

business_feature.title: Retail Brands
business_feature.pain_point: Want to elevate store experience while collecting accurate customer data?
business_feature.description: AIoT sensors provide real‑time heatmaps and CRM integration for differentiated experiences.

business_feature.title: Enterprises
business_feature.pain_point: Traditional access and attendance no longer meet modern efficiency needs?
business_feature.description: Deploy smart access and attendance for better efficiency, security, and employee experience.

public_feature.title: Builders
public_feature.pain_point: How to stand out in a competitive market and boost sales appeal?
public_feature.description: Complete community low‑voltage planning and smart home devices increase value and accelerate sales.

public_feature.title: Hospitals
public_feature.pain_point: Strict safety and flow standards with heavy workload?
public_feature.description: Signaled sensing plus cloud dispatch guides patient flow, reducing manpower needs by 30%.

public_feature.title: Schools
public_feature.pain_point: Frequent campus safety incidents—how to build a safer learning environment?
public_feature.description: End‑to‑end campus safety solutions for schools and kindergartens to ensure peace of mind.

builder_cases.projectNeeds: Enhance community access security, convenience and tech image to attract residents and raise value.
builder_cases.solutionOverview: Deploy smart video intercom with face access and central platform for card‑free entry across the community.

productsUsed.description: Full‑home intercom (10-inch indoor unit YS‑9510, 4.3-inch face door station)

builder_cases.projectNeeds: Provide efficient access management and convenient face entry for a large community.
builder_cases.solutionOverview: Community-wide intercom with 10-inch indoor units and face door stations, integrated with surveillance and access.

productsUsed.description: Community intercom (10-inch indoor unit YS‑8520, face door station)
